prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered gentle pose with hands in taming gesture over geometric beast, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth. Hair or geometric crystalline appendages incorporating dodecahedron, fractal spiral, merkaba patterns from sacred geometry symbolism. Outfit is unique: neutral grey and neutral grey structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding, elaborate with pulsing Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns and flower of life emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like solar medallion with golden ratio geometric design with celestial spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor CHASLPO's profile: 'He of wonderous joy', Aethyr NIA, Earth element, Tarot Strength, Sephirot Tiphareth, Zodiac Leo, embodying the essence: 'In CHASLPO's presence, joy shines like sunlight a musical energy that inspires and buoys the spirit ...' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered gentle pose with hands in taming gesture over geometric beast
visual_elements.head_shape: large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with crystal-like facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth

outfit.base: structured solid robes with crystalline geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for stability and grounding
outfit.details: Earth element square motifs and foundational patterns
outfit.magical_essence: crystalline dust wisps and mineral particles

visual_elements.accessory: solar medallion with golden ratio geometric design
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He of wonderous joy'
profile_data.essence: In CHASLPO's presence, joy shines like sunlight a musical energy that inspires and buoys the spirit with exuberant life.
profile_data.angelic_role: Archangel of Song of Joy; marshals granite-hewn wardens.
profile_data.form_description: A living geometric form embodying the earth element's solidity and the musical vibrational quality of joy, manifesting as a multi-faceted crystal that shifts between geometric precision and organic fluidity
profile_data.color_reasoning: Golden amber represents Tiphareth's solar radiance and Leo's nobility, while forest green connects to earth element and NIA Aethyr's organic vitality
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Dodecahedron represents divine intelligence, fractal spiral shows infinite complexity, merkaba symbolizes interdimensional transformation
